Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Frostbeyet "Thermal"
Reviews.Content: Works as it was advertised, I have had no problems with this camera it is perfect for a stand alone device.

Reviews.Title: the best of the best
Reviews.Author: claudio
Reviews.Content: this is the best investment ever... in one week my sister catch a teaf in her shop... very very nice quality of picture and the night vision is exelent to... I own like four diferent kind of cameras and this is the best ever... I got more for my family and friends and the price is the best thing... I higly recomend it... I think this item came to perfection... I have no cons at all...

ProductInfo.Features:
DVRCam dome is the first camera which include all-in-one security system
Designed to be a stand alone camera, just plug and play, no any wiring project.
We provide a TF card reader for free, you should buy TF card by yourself
The camera can support 2-32GB TF card and can keep 14 days circular recording
Digital Video Format: MPEG4/3GP;VGA (640 x480)
ProductInfo.Name: Coomatec THG Home Shop Video Surveillance CCTV DVR Night Vision Surveillance Security Camera System 32G
